title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.210 - Paid-in capital
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.210 - Paid-in capital

State Regulations

The total amount of cash, property and services
contributed to a corporation by its stockholders and constituting a major
balance sheet item. It may be reflected in a single account or divided between
capital stock and additional paid-in capital accounts. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
451.210

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
